newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: Saudi 52-week T-bill drops to 5.6524 percent.
newsitem.headline: Saudi 52-week T-bill drops to 5.6524 percent.

text.p: The yield on the 52-week Saudi treasury bills worth 500 million riyals dropped to 5.6524 percent from 5.8427 percent last month, a banker in Saudi Arabia said on Tuesday.
The average price climbed to 94.59375 from 94.42188 last month.
The bills are offered once a month by the Saudi Arabian Monetary Agency to Saudi-based banks.
One-year Saudi riyal interbank deposit rates were quoted at 5-3/4, 5/8 percent.
